arts.ttl: All 12 Championship midweek games predictions - Week 11
arts.sum:
Frank Lampard's Coventry City lead the way in the Championship, but face a tricky trip to Portsmouth hoping to protect, or even extend, their advantage at the top of the table.

That is one of 12 matches in a full midweek programme in the second tier and here is how we see the games panning out.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth vs Coventry City: Visitors too strong for mediocre Pompey
arts.sum: Leaders Coventry City should be too strong for Portsmouth in the Championship, says Aidan Perkins.

arts.ttl: “A different beast”: Portsmouth vs Coventry City predictions
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Portsmouth vs Coventry City predictions ahead of the Championship clash on Tuesday. The post “A different beast”: Portsmouth vs Coventry City predictions appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth vs Coventry - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's Championship clash between Portsmouth and Coventry City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

John Swift's smart finish on the counterattack ensured that Portsmouth held promotion hopefuls Leicester to a point at the King Power Stadium on Saturday. This will be a tough test for Pompey who have...
